languages.text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе — неподдельная {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}искренность{/d}, или же ноты стыда — заставляют обеих женщин опустить взгляды. Одна за другой, они бухаются на колени.{/n} "М-м-милости! Запутали нас... запугали..."

{n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то в вашем голосе — неподдельная {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}искренность{/d}, или же ноты стыда — заставляют обеих женщин опустить взгляды. Одна за другой, они бухаются на колени.{/n} "М-м-милости! Запутали нас... запугали..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine sincerity, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

{n}Something in your voice — genuine sincerity, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

{n}Something in your voice — genuine sincerity, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

{n}Something in your voice — genuine sincerity, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

languages.text: {n}你声音中的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}真诚{/d}与遗憾让这两个人女人低下了头。随后，她们不约而同地跪了下来。{/n}“饶——饶命啊！他们欺骗了我们……还恐吓我们……”
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}你声音中的真诚与遗憾让这两个人女人低下了头。随后，她们不约而同地跪了下来。{/n}“饶——饶命啊！他们欺骗了我们……还恐吓我们……”

languages.text: {n}El sonido de tu voz, ya sea por su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sinceridad{/d} o por los tonos de vergüenza que encierra, logra que ambas mujeres bajen la vista. Caen de rodillas ante ti.{/n} «Pi... ¡Piedad! Nos habían engañado... Estábamos asustadas...».
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El sonido de tu voz, ya sea por su sinceridad o por los tonos de vergüenza que encierra, logra que ambas mujeres bajen la vista. Caen de rodillas ante ti.{/n} «Pi... ¡Piedad! Nos habían engañado... Estábamos asustadas...».

languages.text: {n}あなたの声の中にある何か…心からの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}誠実さ{/d}か、羞恥の響き…それによって、2人の女声は視線を下げる。ふたりは順次、跪く。{/n}「ご、御慈悲を！彼らは私達を騙したのです…脅したのです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの声の中にある何か…心からの誠実さか、羞恥の響き…それによって、2人の女声は視線を下げる。ふたりは順次、跪く。{/n}「ご、御慈悲を！彼らは私達を騙したのです…脅したのです…」

languages.text: {n}Vous ne sauriez dire si c'est votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincérité{/d} ou le soupçon de honte dans votre voix qui amène les deux femmes à baisser les yeux. L'une après l'autre, elles tombent à genoux.{/n} « P-pitié ! Ils nous ont embrouillé l'esprit... Nous étions dominées par la peur... »
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous ne sauriez dire si c'est votre sincérité ou le soupçon de honte dans votre voix qui amène les deux femmes à baisser les yeux. L'une après l'autre, elles tombent à genoux.{/n} « P-Pitié ! Ils nous ont embrouillé l'esprit... Nous étions dominées par la peur... »

languages.text: {n}Irgendetwas in deiner Stimme – echte {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}Aufrichtigkeit{/d} oder ein Anflug von Schande – bringt die beiden Frauen dazu, den Blick zu senken. Eine nach der anderen gehen sie auf die Knie.{/n} "G-G-Gnade! Sie haben uns übertölpelt ... uns Angst gemacht ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Irgendetwas in deiner Stimme — echte Aufrichtigkeit oder ein Anflug von Schande — bringt die beiden Frauen dazu, den Blick zu senken. Eine nach der anderen gehen sie auf die Knie.{/n} "G-G-Gnade! Sie haben uns übertölpelt ... uns Angst gemacht ..."

languages.text: {n}Sesindeki hakiki {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}samimiyetten{/d} mi yoksa utanca yaptığın referanstan mı bilinmez, iki kadının da bakışları yere iniyor. Birbiri ardına diz çöküyorlar.{/n} "A... Acıyın bize! Kanımıza girdiler! Gözümüzü korkuttular!"
languages.original_text: {n}Something in your voice — genuine {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}sincerity{/d}, or notes of shame — causes both women to lower their gazes. One after another, they drop to their knees.{/n} "M-m-mercy! They bamboozled us... frightened us..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sesindeki hakiki samimiyetten mi yoksa utanca yaptığın referanstan mı bilinmez, iki kadının da bakışları yere iniyor. Birbiri ardına diz çöküyorlar.{/n} "A... Acıyın bize! Kanımıza girdiler! Gözümüzü korkuttular!"
